name: "Fifteen Minutes of Shame" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What festival is occurring in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Clam Day.

	On Clam Day, the city of Quahog celebrates at a fair on the ocean and all of the proceeds go to fishermen who've been eaten by sharks.

questions.text: Who is the mayor of Quahog?
questions.explanation:
Adam West.

	This is an easy bit of "Family Guy" trivia, but this is the first appearance of the Mayor of Quahog, Adam West.  He was the original Batman.

questions.text: How does Peter embarrass Meg at her slumber party?
options: He walks around the house naked
He says embarrassing stuff about Meg
questions.explanation:
He falls through the stairs.

	Peter falls through the stairs so Meg and the rest of her friends have to help Lois get him out.  Meg feels so embarrassed she brings the family onto a talk show.

questions.text: What is the name of the talk show the Griffins go on?
questions.explanation:
Diane & Diane!.

	The show is hosted by Diane Simmons, the same Diane Simmons from the Channel 5 News.  She brings Meg and the rest of the family onto the show.

questions.text: Who in the family agrees to the idea of having the cameras set up in their house?
questions.explanation:
Peter.

	Peter decides to make his family into a reality show and it aggravates Meg even more because cameras are around the family all the time.

questions.text: Where does the family go for dinner when they're on the reality show?
questions.explanation:
Lobster Shanty.

	The family generally goes to the Lobster Shanty on Sundays.  Stewie catches his own lobsters, and Peter likes the idea of being in a shanty.

questions.text: Who is the first to leave the show?
questions.explanation:
Meg.

	Meg leaves the show and gets replaced by a younger and more sexy girl.  The rest of the family soon leaves the show as well and are replaced by bad actors.

questions.text: Where does Meg not stay at any point in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Joe's house.

	Meg has to leave Cleveland's house because his great uncle Chet died in the bed the previous night, and she had to leave Quagmire's house because he was with another woman.

questions.text: At the end of the show, who is the most popular character on the show when the Griffins are talking about their contract?
questions.explanation:
Meg.

	The new girl who plays Meg on the reality show gets most of the air time and the ratings because she is a sexy teen.

questions.text: Who begins retyping Meg's diary entry at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Stewie.

	Stewie replaces the words "I couldn't be happier" with "I want to kill them all".  The family must stay in a motel room until the reality show is over.
